SEARCH
Module GUIs
Package GUIs

Class JobDatabase

java.lang.Object
GUIs.JobDatabase
public class JobDatabase extends Object
Database of Jobs
Keeps an ArrayList of jobs
Also holds methods used to handle and sort the database.
Author:
Sebastian Borner

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    JobDatabase()
    This is the default constructor for a GUIs.JobDatabase
    Uses the buildDatabaseFromFile method after initializing the arrayList of jobs to fill it in

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    addJob(Job newJob)
    Method to add a job into the database.
    Writes to the database to update it in case you close the file.
    Will return false and not input the job if another job exists with the same job ID number

    Method mostly for testing used to get a job by its number orderwise on the list

    Prints the database
    Calls printJob() for each job in the database's arraylist

    removeJob(int ID)
    Method used to remove a job from the database
    Deletes a job by ID, if two jobs exist with the same ID(which shouldnt happen),
    instead deletes the first job on the list

  • Constructor Details

    • JobDatabase

      public JobDatabase()
      This is the default constructor for a GUIs.JobDatabase
      Uses the buildDatabaseFromFile method after initializing the arrayList of jobs to fill it in

  • Method Details

    • getJob

      public Job getJob(int target)
      Method mostly for testing used to get a job by its number orderwise on the list
      Parameters:
      target - gets a specific job by number on the list
      Returns:
      Job the job at element target

    • addJob

      public boolean addJob(Job newJob)
      Method to add a job into the database.
      Writes to the database to update it in case you close the file.
      Will return false and not input the job if another job exists with the same job ID number
      Parameters:
      newJob - the GUIs.Job to be added into the database
      Returns:
      boolean returns true if the method worked
      returns false if there exists a job in the jobDatabase that shares the same ID number or if it contains a pipe anywhere

    • removeJob

      public boolean removeJob(int ID)
      Method used to remove a job from the database
      Deletes a job by ID, if two jobs exist with the same ID(which shouldnt happen),
      instead deletes the first job on the list
      Parameters:
      ID - the ID number of the job you want to remove
      Returns:
      boolean returns true if a job was removed

    • printDatabase

      public String printDatabase()
      Prints the database
      Calls printJob() for each job in the database's arraylist
      Returns:
      a string of all the jobs in a printable form

    • logDatabase

      public String logDatabase()
      Method used to print out all jobs in a log form, used for testing
      Returns:
      returns a string of all jobs in log form

    • getJobListSortedByID

      public ArrayList<Job> getJobListSortedByID()
      Method used to get the list of jobs in the database ordered by ID
      Returns:
      a sorted ArrayList of jobs

      public ArrayList<Job> getJobListSortedByDate()
      Method used to get the list of jobs in the database ordered by Date
      Returns:
      a sorted ArrayList of jobs
